title: Type ID Request
content:
Any help would be appreciated.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20081203210930im_/http:/www.typophile.com/files/Undertow_4594.gif)

 [‹ Name these fonts?](http://web.archive.org/web/20081203210930/http:/www.typophile.com/node/41316 "Go to previous forum topic") [Punch Drunk Love Sans title style ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20081203210930/http:/www.typophile.com/node/41315 "Go to next forum topic")
author: jason

comments.content: But the x-height (and that f) make me want to say Futura. But a lot of the characters (t,a,g) say it’s more humanist and not Futura at all.
Durp, I did a quick glance at Neutraface in my Suitcase and totally saw the Alt version only. I knew that font looked to damned familiar!
It appears to be the Text Demi weight. Thanks Stephen.
